title: Chapter 953 - There’S A Problem With That Boy

Chapter 953 - There’S A Problem With That Boy

The City of Eternal Night.

An ancient city famous throughout the Netherworld for too many years to count.

Rumor had it that the island the city was built upon was actually the remains of a long-dead dragon turtle. It was fully three hundred miles across.

The city was shrouded in darkness year-round. Even the nearby seas were covered in dark, dense clouds. No light got through.

However, every district of the city was thoroughly lamplit. The blazing lights were like a long, radiant dragon, dispelling the city’s darkness.

Two days later.

When Wang Chonglu saw the ancient city in the distance, he visibly sighed in relief.

Throughout the ages, the City of Eternal Night had always been the only safe haven in the boundless Sea of Bitterness.

No matter what dangers one encountered while exploring the Sea of Bitterness, so long as they reached the City of Eternal Night, they could enjoy its protection.

Similarly, no matter how vicious and malevolent someone was, they dared not cause trouble within city limits.

Doing so wouldn’t just provoke the ire of every other cultivator in the city; those who acted up died suddenly and inexplicably.
